name: Bun Air Corporation
about: Bun Air Corporation is a comprehensive aviation services provider based in Bedford County, Pennsylvania. While not exclusively a flying school, Bun Air offers flight training as part of its extensive range of services. The company specializes in aircraft management, charter flights, and aircraft maintenance, ensuring a seamless aviation experience. With a fleet that includes Cessna CJ jets, Bun Air caters to various aviation needs, from on-demand charters to general aviation services. Their facilities at the Bedford County Airport include amenities such as a lounge, conference room, and weather briefing kiosk. Bun Air is committed to excellence and customer satisfaction, making it a reliable choice for all aviation requirements. Learn to fly or manage your aircraft with the expertise of Bun Air Corporation.
